section.name: Pre-requisite
section.p: Silverpeas V5 has been tested and can be automatically deployed on a pre-configured version of JBoss 4.0.3. Silverpeas V5 has also been successfully deployed and run on other Application Servers (such as Websphere, Weblogic, ect.). Please find a list of the tools you will need to install Silverpeas below.

subsection.name: Java 6
subsection.p: Silverpeas needs a JDK at least of version 6, which can be downloaded from Sun here

subsection.name: Apache Maven
subsection.p:
Apache Maven 2.2.x is used in Silverpeas for the building of components and the assembly. It must be installed on the target platform.
For correct installation, see Maven - The Definitive Guide
For more information about Apache Maven, please see the their website or download the ebook

subsection.name: Postgresql
subsection.p: Silverpeas can use any JDBC compliant RDBMS, however the Open source solution is pre-configured to run on PostgreSQL 8.x. which can be downloaded from here.
You will have to create a database SilverpeasV5 with a user postgres/postgres with administrative rights. You may use the tool pgAdmin which provides a GUI to manage Postgresql.

subsection.name: Installing JBoss
subsection.p: Currently we provide a packaged and pre-configured version of JBoss 4.0.3 for Windows. Please download it from here.
You have to set-up the environment variable %JBOSS_HOME% for the directory in which you have unzipped the jboss403.zip

subsection.name: Preparing Silverpeas
subsection.p: We currently provide a packaged and pre-configured version that will build Silverpeas and its database. Please download it from here.
1. Unzip/decompress the contents into any directory,
2. Define an environment variable %SILVERPEAS_HOME% that points to this directory.

For example:
unzip the production.zip file into C:\Silverpeas\production.
The %SILVERPEAS_HOME% should be located at C:\Silverpeas\production.

3. Next, configure your installation by editing the files
%SILVERPEAS_HOME%\setup\settings\A200003Settings.xml and
%SILVERPEAS_HOME%\setup\settings\SilverpeasSettings.xml.

subsection.name: Deploying Silverpeas
subsection.p: This is a 4 step operation in %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\silverpeas\bin:

subsection.name: Launching Silverpeas
subsection.p: In %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\silverpeas\bin you can launch Silverpeas with silverpeas_start_jboss.cmd.
In %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\silverpeas\bin you can stop Silverpeas with silverpeas_stop_jboss.cmd.
